title: Interest groups compete for influence in pluralism

content.question: Interest-group pluralism refers to a system in which

choices.label: many competing interest groups nominate candidates for office
many interest groups compete to influence government policy
society is dominated by ethnic factions
a large proportion of citizens are members of interest groups

content.answer: many interest groups compete to influence government policy

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
